verses.verse: שַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> shal-Lach Cast לַחְמְךָ֖ <S%H3899><s%> lach-me-Cha thy bread עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei upon הַמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim; the waters כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- after בְרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> ve-Ro it after many הַיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim days תִּמְצָאֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4672><s%> tim-tza-'En-nu. for thou shalt find

תֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> ten- Give חֵ֥לֶק <S%H2506><s%> Che-lek a portion לְשִׁבְעָ֖ה <S%H7651><s%> le-shiv-'Ah to seven וְגַ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam even לִשְׁמוֹנָ֑ה <S%H8083><s%> lish-mo-Nah; and also to eight כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תֵדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> te-Da', for thou knowest מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- what יִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh may occur רָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah not what evil עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. shall be upon the earth

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If יִמָּלְא֨וּ <S%H4390><s%> yim-mal-'U be full הֶעָבִ֥ים <S%H5645><s%> he-'a-Vim If the clouds גֶּ֙שֶׁם֙ <S%H1653><s%> ge-shem of rain עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz [themselves] upon the earth יָרִ֔יקוּ <S%H7324><s%> ya-Ri-ku, they empty וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- and whether יִפּ֥וֹל <S%H5307><s%> yip-Pol fall עֵ֛ץ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz and if the tree בַּדָּר֖וֹם <S%H1864><s%> bad-da-Rom toward the south וְאִ֣ם <S%H518><s%> ve-'Im If בַּצָּפ֑וֹן <S%H6828><s%> batz-tza-Fon; or toward the north מְק֛וֹם <S%H4725><s%> me-Kom in the place שֶׁיִּפּ֥וֹל <S%H5307><s%> shei-yip-Pol falleth הָעֵ֖ץ <S%H6086><s%> ha-'Etz where the tree שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there יְהֽוּא׃ <S%H1933><s%> ye-Hu. there it shall be

שֹׁמֵ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> sho-Mer He that observeth ר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach the wind לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo will not יִזְרָ֑ע <S%H2232><s%> yiz-Ra'; shall not sow וְרֹאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> ve-ro-'Eh and he that regardeth בֶעָבִ֖ים <S%H5645><s%> ve-'a-Vim the clouds לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo will not יִקְצֽוֹר׃ <S%H7114><s%> yik-Tzor. shall not reap

כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher who אֵֽינְךָ֤ <S%H369><s%> 'ei-ne-Cha not יוֹדֵ֙עַ֙ <S%H3045><s%> yo-De-a' As thou knowest מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- how long דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech not what [is] the way הָר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> ha-Ru-ach, of the spirit כַּעֲצָמִ֖ים <S%H6106><s%> ka-'a-tza-Mim [nor] how the bones בְּבֶ֣טֶן <S%H990><s%> be-Ve-ten [do grow] in the womb הַמְּלֵאָ֑ה <S%H4392><s%> ham-me-le-'Ah; of her that is with child כָּ֗כָה <S%H3602><s%> Ka-chah, so לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תֵדַע֙ <S%H3045><s%> te-Da' even so thou knowest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh not the works הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh who maketh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכֹּֽל׃ <S%H3605><s%> hak-Kol. all

בַּבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker In the morning זְרַ֣ע <S%H2232><s%> ze-Ra' sow אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זַרְעֶ֔ךָ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'E-cha, thy seed וְלָעֶ֖רֶב <S%H6153><s%> ve-la-'E-rev and in the evening אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay תַּנַּ֣ח <S%H3240><s%> tan-Nach withhold יָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> ya-De-cha; not thine hand כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֵֽינְךָ֨ <S%H369><s%> 'ei-ne-Cha for יוֹדֵ֜ע <S%H3045><s%> yo-De' for thou knowest אֵ֣י <S%H335><s%> 'ei not whether זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh morning יִכְשָׁר֙ <S%H3787><s%> yich-Shar shall prosper הֲזֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> ha-Zeh morning אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or זֶ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> Zeh, morning וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- whether שְׁנֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H8147><s%> she-nei-Hem either this or that or whether they both כְּאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> ke-'e-Chad [shall be] alike טוֹבִֽים׃ <S%H2896><s%> to-Vim. good

וּמָת֖וֹק <S%H4966><s%> u-ma-Tok [is] sweet הָא֑וֹר <S%H216><s%> ha-'Or; Truly the light וְט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> ve-Tov and a pleasant לַֽעֵינַ֖יִם <S%H5869><s%> la-'ei-Na-yim [thing it is] for the eyes לִרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> lir-'ot to behold אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <S%H8121><s%> hash-Sha-mesh. the sun

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki Indeed אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if שָׁנִ֥ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim years הַרְבֵּ֛ה <S%H7235><s%> har-Beh many יִחְיֶ֥ה <S%H2421><s%> yich-Yeh live הָאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam But if a man בְּכֻלָּ֣ם <S%H3605><s%> be-chul-Lam all יִשְׂמָ֑ח <S%H8055><s%> yis-Mach; [and] rejoice וְיִזְכֹּר֙ <S%H2142><s%> ve-yiz-Kor in them all yet let him remember אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei the days הַחֹ֔שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> ha-Cho-shech, of darkness כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Indeed הַרְבֵּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> har-Beh for they shall be many יִהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- Everything שֶׁבָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> sheb-Ba All that cometh הָֽבֶל׃ <S%H1892><s%> Ha-vel. [is] vanity

שְׂמַ֧ח <S%H8055><s%> se-Mach Rejoice בָּח֣וּר <S%H970><s%> ba-Chur O young man בְּיַלְדוּתֶ֗יךָ <S%H3208><s%> be-yal-du-Tei-cha, in thy youth וִֽיטִֽיבְךָ֤ <S%H3190><s%> vi-ti-ve-Cha be pleasant לִבְּךָ֙ <S%H3820><s%> lib-be-Cha and let thy heart בִּימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> bi-Mei thee in the days בְחוּרוֹתֶ֔ךָ <S%H979><s%> ve-chu-ro-Te-cha, of thy youth וְהַלֵּךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> ve-hal-leCh and walk בְּדַרְכֵ֣י <S%H1870><s%> be-dar-Chei in the ways לִבְּךָ֔ <S%H3820><s%> lib-be-Cha, of thine heart וּבְמַרְאֵ֖י <S%H4758><s%> u-ve-mar-'Ei and in the sight עֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei-cha; of thine eyes וְדָ֕ע <S%H3045><s%> ve-Da' but know כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> ki for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- for all אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these יְבִֽיאֲךָ֥ <S%H935><s%> ye-vi-'a-Cha will bring הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him thou that for all these [things] God בַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> bam-mish-Pat. thee into judgment

וְהָסֵ֥ר <S%H5493><s%> ve-ha-Ser Therefore remove כַּ֙עַס֙ <S%H3708><s%> ka-'as sorrow מִלִּבֶּ֔ךָ <S%H3820><s%> mil-lib-Be-cha, from thy heart וְהַעֲבֵ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> ve-ha-'a-Ver and put away רָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah evil מִבְּשָׂרֶ֑ךָ <S%H1320><s%> mib-be-sa-Re-cha; from thy flesh כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because הַיַּלְד֥וּת <S%H3208><s%> hai-yal-Dut for childhood וְהַֽשַּׁחֲר֖וּת <S%H7839><s%> ve-hash-sha-cha-Rut and youth הָֽבֶל׃ <S%H1892><s%> Ha-vel. [are] vanity
